top.title: The Download: mimicking pregnancy’s first moments in a lab, and AI parameters explained
top.summary: OpenAI’s GPT-3, released in 2020, had 175 billion parameters. Google DeepMind’s latest LLM, Gemini 3, may have at least a trillion—some think it’s probably more like 7 trillion—but the company isn’t saying. In three recent papers published by Cell Press, scientists report what they call the most accurate efforts yet to mimic the first moments of pregnancy in the lab.

top.title: Google: Don’t make “bite-sized” content for LLMs if you care about search rank
top.summary: In the latest installment of Google’s Search Off the Record podcast , John Mueller and Danny Sullivan say that breaking content down into bite-sized chunks for LLMs like Gemini is a bad idea. An increasingly popular approach geared toward LLMs called “content chunking” may fall into that category. top.title: X tiene un grave problema con Grok: se ha convertido en un pozo sin fondo de gente desnudando a mujeres con IA
top.summary: A diferencia de otros chatbots como ChatGPT , Claude o Gemini , Grok no impone muchos límites para generar contenido sexualizado de personas reales. El problema es cuando ese contenido se utiliza para desinformar o acaba dañando a otras personas. Y es que hoy por hoy, Grok se ha convertido en una de las principales fuentes de imágenes sexualizadas creadas sin consentimiento.

top.title: LLMs contain a LOT of parameters. But what’s a parameter?
top.summary: Back in February, OpenAI released GPT-4.5 , the firm’s largest LLM yet (some estimates have put its parameter count at more than 10 trillion). | MIT Technology Review Skip to Content MIT Technology Review Featured Topics Newsletters Events Audio MIT Technology Review Featured Topics Newsletters Events Audio Artificial intelligence LLMs contain a LOT of parameters. OpenAI’s GPT-3, released in 2020, had 175 billion parameters.

top.title: Aplicaciones de ChatGPT: qué son y cómo usarlas para darles más funciones a ChatGPT
top.summary: Qué son las aplicaciones de ChatGPT Las aplicaciones de ChatGPT, también llamadas GPT Apps o conectores, son unas extensiones que permiten que la IA se conecte con servicios externos para realizar tareas específicas. De esta manera, podrás usar funciones de Photoshop, Canva, TripAdvisor, Apple Music y muchas otras desde la propia ChatGPT . Herramientas.title: The Download: the case for AI slop, and helping CRISPR fulfill its promise
Herramientas.summary: To try to get to the bottom of how I felt (and why), I spoke to the people making the videos, a company creating bespoke tools for creators, and experts who study how new media becomes culture. How I learned to stop worrying and love AI slop —Caiwei Chen If I were to locate the moment AI slop broke through into popular consciousness, I’d pick the video of rabbits bouncing on a trampoline that went viral last summer. For many savvy internet users, myself included, it was the first time we were fooled by an AI video, and it ended up spawning a wave of almost identical generated clips.

Herramientas.title: Using unstructured data to fuel enterprise AI success
Herramientas.summary: Preparing and contextualizing this data is essential for moving from AI experiments to measurable results. The challenges of organizing and contextualizing unstructured data Unstructured data presents inherent difficulties due to its widely varying format, quality, and reliability, requiring specialized tools like natural language processing and AI to make sense of it. Yet this invaluable business intelligence, estimated to make up as much as 90% of the data generated by organizations, historically remained dormant because its unstructured nature makes analysis extremely difficult.

Herramientas.title: Deploying a hybrid approach to Web3 in the AI era
Herramientas.summary: Where Web2, which emerged in the early 2000s, relies on centralized systems to store data and supply compute, all owned—and monetized by—a handful of global conglomerates, Web3 turns that structure on its head. Instead, data and compute are decentralized through technologies like blockchain and peer-to-peer networks. All while using familiar developer tooling and open, usage-based incentives.

Herramientas.title: The man who made India digital isn’t done yet
Herramientas.summary: Aadhaar means “foundation” in Hindi, and on that bedrock Nilekani and people working with him went on to build a sprawling collection of free, interoperating online tools that add up to nothing less than a digital infrastructure for society. By Edd Gent archive page January 7, 2026 Andrea D'Aquino Nandan Nilekani can’t stop trying to push India into the future. He started nearly 30 years ago, masterminding an ongoing experiment in technological state capacity that started with Aadhaar—the world’s largest digital identity system.

Regulación.title: A new CRISPR startup is betting regulators will ease up on gene-editing
Regulación.summary: Yet so far, there’s been only one gene-editing drug approved. It’s been used commercially on only about 40 patients, all with sickle-cell disease. It’s becoming clear that the impact of CRISPR isn’t as big as we all hoped.

The Download: war in Europe, and the company that wants to cool the planet
Regulación.summary: The system had been cobbled together over the course of four months—an astonishing pace for weapons development, which is usually measured in years. Its purpose is to connect everything that looks for targets—“sensors,” in military lingo—and everything that fires on them (“shooters”) to a single, shared wireless electronic brain. Eighty years after total war last transformed the continent, the Hedgehog tests signal a brutal new calculus of European defense.

Dell ha sido la primera en admitir lo evidente: casi nadie quiere un ordenador con IA por mucho que la industria se empeñe
Hardware.summary: Ese foco absoluto en prometer el oro y el moro en la nueva generación de PCs gracias a las virtudes de la inteligencia artificial está desapareciendo y la razón es obvia: a casi nadie le importa si su PC tiene o no funciones de IA. Kevin Terwilliger, máximo responsable de productos en Dell, indicó en una entrevista reciente con PC Gamer que la fiebre de la IA en PCs ha acabado provocando mucha decepción entre los usuarios. "De hecho", explica, "creo que la IA probablemente les confunde más que ayudarles para conseguir un resultado específico".
